scripts.publish: set -e; printf 'Commit message: '; read msg; git fetch origin; BR=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); REM=origin/$BR; BEHIND=$(git rev-list --left-right --count HEAD...$REM 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}'); if [ "$BEHIND" -ne 0 ]; then echo '❌ Your branch is behind the remote. Please run: git pull --rebase'; exit 1; fi; if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; then git add .; git commit -m "${msg:-update}" || true; fi; if [ -n "$(git ls-files -u)" ]; then echo '❌ Merge conflicts detected. Resolve them and re-run npm run publish.'; exit 1; fi; git push && npm run build && npm run deploy
